Header: SFHQ-Cen Troops Donate Blood to Mark Army Anniversary
Content: To coincide with the forthcoming 69th Army Day & Anniversary, Security Force Headquarters â€“ Central (SFHQ-Cen) troops launched a blood donation programme at Diyatalawa Army Base Hospital on Thursday (4) under the guidance and supervision of the Commander, Security Forces - Central, Major General Rukmal Dias. 10 Officers and 70 Other Rankers from the SFHQ-Cen voluntarily donated their blood for use of patients in Diyatalawa and suburbs.
